params.destinationChain: Axelar registered name of the destination chain
params.executionGasLimit: The gas limit to be used for the destination contract execution,        e.g. pass in 200k if your app consumes needs upto 200k for this contract call
params.params: Additional parameters for the gas estimation

returns.gasEstimate: The cross-chain gas estimate, in terms of source chain's native gas token that should be forwarded to the gas service.

returns._0: gasInfo The gas info for the chain

estimateGasFee(string,string,bytes,uint2.notice: Estimates the gas fee for a cross-chain contract call.

getGasInfo(string).notice: Returns the gas price for a specific chain.
